mapper.select: select id, warn_id, warn_cfg_id, warn_name, warn_level, warning_type, warn_content, warn_time, group_id, group_name, group_leader_no, seats_no, seats_name, organ, conver_time, call_id, cust_phone, star_level, cust_label, crt_time, modf_time, op_pren_id, cmos_modify_time from realtime.t_tp_warning_record where id = #{id}

select id, warn_id, warn_cfg_id, warn_name, warn_level, warning_type, warn_content, warn_time, group_id, group_name, group_leader_no, seats_no, seats_name, organ, conver_time, call_id, cust_phone, star_level, cust_label, crt_time, modf_time, op_pren_id, cmos_modify_time from realtime.t_tp_warning_record limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into realtime.t_tp_warning_record(warn_id, warn_cfg_id, warn_name, warn_level, warning_type, warn_content, warn_time, group_id, group_name, group_leader_no, seats_no, seats_name, organ, conver_time, call_id, cust_phone, star_level, cust_label, crt_time, modf_time, op_pren_id, cmos_modify_time) values (#{warnId}, #{warnCfgId}, #{warnName}, #{warnLevel}, #{warningType}, #{warnContent}, #{warnTime}, #{groupId}, #{groupName}, #{groupLeaderNo}, #{seatsNo}, #{seatsName}, #{organ}, #{converTime}, #{callId}, #{custPhone}, #{starLevel}, #{custLabel}, #{crtTime}, #{modfTime}, #{opPrenId}, #{cmosModifyTime})

insert into realtime.t_tp_warning_record(warn_id, warn_cfg_id, warn_name, warn_level, warning_type, warn_content, warn_time, group_id, group_name, group_leader_no, seats_no, seats_name, organ, conver_time, call_id, cust_phone, star_level, cust_label, crt_time, modf_time, op_pren_id, cmos_modify_time) values
(#{entity.warnId}, #{entity.warnCfgId}, #{entity.warnName}, #{entity.warnLevel}, #{entity.warningType}, #{entity.warnContent}, #{entity.warnTime}, #{entity.groupId}, #{entity.groupName}, #{entity.groupLeaderNo}, #{entity.seatsNo}, #{entity.seatsName}, #{entity.organ}, #{entity.converTime}, #{entity.callId}, #{entity.custPhone}, #{entity.starLevel}, #{entity.custLabel}, #{entity.crtTime}, #{entity.modfTime}, #{entity.opPrenId}, #{entity.cmosModifyTime})

insert into realtime.t_tp_warning_record(warn_id, warn_cfg_id, warn_name, warn_level, warning_type, warn_content, warn_time, group_id, group_name, group_leader_no, seats_no, seats_name, organ, conver_time, call_id, cust_phone, star_level, cust_label, crt_time, modf_time, op_pren_id, cmos_modify_time) values
(#{entity.warnId}, #{entity.warnCfgId}, #{entity.warnName}, #{entity.warnLevel}, #{entity.warningType}, #{entity.warnContent}, #{entity.warnTime}, #{entity.groupId}, #{entity.groupName}, #{entity.groupLeaderNo}, #{entity.seatsNo}, #{entity.seatsName}, #{entity.organ}, #{entity.converTime}, #{entity.callId}, #{entity.custPhone}, #{entity.starLevel}, #{entity.custLabel}, #{entity.crtTime}, #{entity.modfTime}, #{entity.opPrenId}, #{entity.cmosModifyTime})
on duplicate key update warn_id = values(warn_id) , warn_cfg_id = values(warn_cfg_id) , warn_name = values(warn_name) , warn_level = values(warn_level) , warning_type = values(warning_type) , warn_content = values(warn_content) , warn_time = values(warn_time) , group_id = values(group_id) , group_name = values(group_name) , group_leader_no = values(group_leader_no) , seats_no = values(seats_no) , seats_name = values(seats_name) , organ = values(organ) , conver_time = values(conver_time) , call_id = values(call_id) , cust_phone = values(cust_phone) , star_level = values(star_level) , cust_label = values(cust_label) , crt_time = values(crt_time) , modf_time = values(modf_time) , op_pren_id = values(op_pren_id) , cmos_modify_time = values(cmos_modify_time)
mapper.update:
update realtime.t_tp_warning_record
warn_id = #{warnId},
warn_cfg_id = #{warnCfgId},
warn_name = #{warnName},
warn_level = #{warnLevel},
warning_type = #{warningType},
warn_content = #{warnContent},
warn_time = #{warnTime},
group_id = #{groupId},
group_name = #{groupName},
group_leader_no = #{groupLeaderNo},
seats_no = #{seatsNo},
seats_name = #{seatsName},
organ = #{organ},
conver_time = #{converTime},
call_id = #{callId},
cust_phone = #{custPhone},
star_level = #{starLevel},
cust_label = #{custLabel},
crt_time = #{crtTime},
modf_time = #{modfTime},
op_pren_id = #{opPrenId},
cmos_modify_time = #{cmosModifyTime},
where id = #{id}
